availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles H. Walker (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Bloyd Walker in Green County, Kentucky, on October 12, 1836. Father of Ann Walker, George W. Walker, John Walker, David Walker, Elizabeth Walker, Greenberry Walker, Nancy Walker, Mary A. Walker, and Martha Ann Walker. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1840. Farmer in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 000594644.
